mapper.select: SELECT YOUTUBE_TITLE , YOUTUBE_URL , YOUTUBE_IMG , YOUTUBE_ID FROM YOUTUBE_MNG
SELECT DISEASE_SEQ , DISEASE_NAME , DISEASE_CONTENT , DISEASE_NAME_UN , DISEASE_CATEGORY , REMARK , DISEASE_SYMPTOM , DISEASE_CURE FROM DISEASE_LIST WHERE DISEASE_SEQ = #{key}
SELECT USER_SEQ , USER_ID , USER_BIRTH , USER_SEX , USER_NICKNAME FROM USER_MNG WHERE USER_ID = #{uniqueId}

SELECT Q.Q_SEQ , Q.UPPER_Q_SEQ , Q.COMMON_Q_YN , Q.CATEGORY , Q.CATEGORY_SUB , Q.Q_CONTENTS , Q.SELECT_TYPE , Q.ORDER_NO , SI.SELECTED_SEQ , SI.Q1_SELECTED_SEQ , SI.UPPER_Q_SEQ_SELECTED__SEQ , SI.SELECTED_CONTENTS , SI.ORDER , SI.QT_Q_SEQ FROM QUESTION_MNG Q LEFT JOIN SELECT_INFO_TABLE AS SI ON SI.QT_Q_SEQ = Q.Q_SEQ WHERE Q.USE_YN = 'Y' AND SI.USE_YN = 'Y' AND Q.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

SELECT Q.Q_SEQ , Q.UPPER_Q_SEQ , Q.COMMON_Q_YN , Q.CATEGORY , Q.CATEGORY_SUB , Q.Q_CONTENTS , Q.SELECT_TYPE , Q.ORDER_NO , SI.SELECTED_SEQ , SI.Q1_SELECTED_SEQ , SI.UPPER_Q_SEQ_SELECTED__SEQ , SI.SELECTED_CONTENTS , SI.ORDER , SI.QT_Q_SEQ FROM ketotalk.QUESTION_MNG Q LEFT JOIN ketotalk.SELECT_INFO_TABLE AS SI ON SI.QT_Q_SEQ = Q.Q_SEQ WHERE Q.USE_YN = 'Y' AND SI.USE_YN = 'Y' AND SI.Q1_SELECTED_SEQ = #{q1_selected_seq} AND Q.ORDER_NO = 2
